text:
November 28, 1939
Mr, M.3. Novlk
Director of WNYC
Municipal Building
New York City, New York
Dear Novlk:
This morning I sent you the following wire:
RCA ADVIBES LICENSE NECESSARY BY DECEMBER FIRST,
THINK YOU ADVISED EARLY SAID EXTENSION WOULD BE
GRANTED NAEB MEMBERS. CM YOU GET US DEFINITE
ADVICE ’WHAT ACTION OUR STATIONS MUST TAKE
I hope you found It possible to get in touch with
Mr, Early. Some of the members are quite worried,
including WILL. Perhaps this letter of RCA-Vlctor
went to all radio stations, but it was my under¬
standing from conversation with you that an addi¬
tional time would be granted NAEB stations.
Perhaps Mr. Early is reluctant to put that in
writing.
Cordially,
Frank E. Sohooley
